content: Kickoff workshop: catalogued friction points for agent hand-offs and identified shared vocabulary gaps across teams.
summary: Kickoff captured alignment gaps for agent collaboration.

content: Generated five solution themes; rapid prototype of shared context timeline scored highest during silent voting.
summary: Prototype shared context timeline ranked highest among solution themes.

content: Benchmarked similar assistant ecosystems; context stitching reduced duplicate tool invocations by 38% in comparable deployments.
summary: External benchmark shows context stitching cut duplicate tool calls by 38%.

content: Assigned prototype spikes: Mia leads shared timeline API, Omar validates memory summarizer hooks, Priya drafts telemetry schema.
summary: Prototype tasks assigned across API, summarizer, and telemetry spikes.

content: Retrospective: structured context timeline increased retrieval signal quality; follow-up to pilot with support pod next sprint.
summary: Retro confirmed timeline improved retrieval; plan pilot with support pod.
